items.sentence: Tom could\'ve figured that out without Mary\'s help.
Tom was taken to the hospital for alcohol poisoning.
Tom was the first man to ever pay attention to Mary.
Tom was the first one to realize what was happening.
Tom was the one who taught me how to play this song.
Tom was unable to decide which shirt he should wear.
Tom scolded Mary for not treating John with respect.
Tom seemed to enjoy himself at the party last night.
I think it\'s too early in the morning to visit Tom.
I think it\'s unlikely Tom will ask Mary to do that.
